title: Triumphal Return to Rome of Scipio Africanus
credit_line: J. Willis Dalzell Memorial Collection, bequest of Mrs. J. Willis Dalzell
provenance_text:
Giovanni Guidi [1406-1486] (attributed to). Mrs. J. Willis Dalzell (Mary Beer Dalzell) [1844-1929], Pittsburgh, PA, until February 13, 1929; Mary B. Dalzell estate, February 1929; bequest to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1929 [1].

Notes:
[1]. The panel painting, as by Giovanni Diddo, was collected from Mrs. Dalzell's residence on Ridge Avenue in Pittsburgh and brought to Carnegie Institute on February 19, 1929. It was accessioned on February 25, 1929.

Under review by CGK

creator.full_name: Giovanni di Ser Giovanni Guidi (called Scheggia)
